trends: There have been no other sightings in St. Peters
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: moving west to east hovered over building no lights silent
divs: Sighting Detailssitting on porch with friend saw objet approach from the west at first thought it might be a large hawk riding wind currents as it got close we noticed that the object was triangle shape black in color and no lights or sound. before crossing over our apt building it stopped in mid air and hovered for five minutes then proceeded on i wen inside to get my cam ran out the front door to film as it headed east but it just vanished I have 150 hours of flight time and this was no coventiual aircraft I am also a former mufon field investigator my friend was dubfounded
